snippet: The news that Mrs. Clinton conducted business as secretary of state entirely on a private email account highlights the risks of betting on a candidate so early in the presidential nominating process.
abstract: News that Hillary Rodham Clinton conducted government business on private email account while secretary of state has leading Democrats defending her broadly while avoiding questions about transparency and ethics; their loyalty is measure of her political strength and lack of other presidential hopefuls in 2016.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and MAGGIE HABERMAN

lead_paragraph: The news that Mrs. Clinton conducted business as secretary of state entirely on a private email account highlights the risks of betting on a candidate so early in the presidential nominating process.

headline.main: Caught Off Guard by Disclosure of Emails, Democrats Rally to Clinton’s Defense
headline.print_headline: Caught Off Guard by Disclosure of Emails, Democrats Rally to Clinton’s Defense
